text: I'm building a HubDB page that lists out manufacturers, for one of my clients. On the left side of the page you can drill down by product type. However, some of the manufacturers fall into multiple product categories (i.e. Fittings & Valves, and Sample Cylinders). Is there a best practice on how to set this up in HubDB. Here is the page I'm working on: <https://www.silcotek.com/coated-products>.
Here is the code that I have setup in my custom module:
Awesome. My email address: <mailto:eileen@nrmedia.biz|eileen@nrmedia.biz> , feel free to reach out anytime that works for you. Thanks again.

you cannot do an OR with multiple categories. If the column is a multiple select type, you can use the `in` operator to select rows that contain any of a set of values. See <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/hubdb/v2/get_table_rows>
